room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The Hostage Escape was Awesome! I took my 3 kids and hadwe had a couple more minutes, we would have escaped. Our game master, Kenny, did an incredible job giving us hints without revealing the answer. This room was challenging with some really cool tricks to figure out to solve the clues. We are looking forward to coming back, hopefully this week, to do another room.  Great Time!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This place is amazing. We did the Hostage room and it was very cool. We had a wide array of ages with us and everyone enjoyed themselves. The staff was great!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We had such a good time. Our intent was to do something we'd never done for date night. We did Hostage and it was difficult but awesome. Can't wait to go back and try a different room.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Great setup! Went with my wife and kids. Got out of Hostage with 6 min left.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Took four nine-year-old girls for my daughter's birthday. Had a ton of fun. We were able to work together and escape the Hostage room in 53 minutes. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Went with the family...great experience and great challenge. We didn't get out (but we were close:-), but we had a great time. Recommend!
